description:
Summer's here, it's time to explore. These light hiking shoes are built with ventilation panels and quick-drying materials, keeping your feet cool and comfortable on hot trail days. Built on an athletic platform, they provide cushioning without feeling bulky. Elastic cord and a lace-lock system makes for quick in-and-out and a secure fit.

  • Durable synthetic leather and mesh upper offers breathable comfort
  • Kinetic Fit™ BASE insole contours to foot for flexible cushioning
  • Air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
  • EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Moulded nylon arch shank adds support
  • Grippy rubber outsole sticks to wet or dry surfaces
name: Merrell Wildwood Aerosport Shoes - Men's
